name: @cipherstash/stashjs-grpc
description: Generated Typescript GRPC bindings for StashJS

scripts.build: pnpx rimraf ./dist && proto-loader-gen-types api.proto --outDir=generated --grpcLib=@grpc/grpc-js --includeDirs grpc/v1 --keepCase=true --longs=number --enums=string --defaults=true --oneofs==true && pnpx tsc && cp -RL grpc dist
scripts.postinstall: pnpx rimraf ./dist && proto-loader-gen-types api.proto --outDir=generated --grpcLib=@grpc/grpc-js --includeDirs grpc/v1 --keepCase=true --longs=number --enums=string --defaults=true --oneofs==true && pnpx tsc && cp -RL grpc dist
